name: Undermining Strategic IDC Assets
description: Weakening the financial, technological, and logistical support structures that sustain IDC global dominance.

cards.title: Economic Warfare and Resource Control
cards.description: Targeting IDC-controlled financial markets and monopolies to break economic dependency.
bulletpoints: Identifying and exposing economic manipulation strategies.
Encouraging alternative economic models and local currencies.
Undermining corporate monopolies through decentralized commerce.

cards.title: Sabotaging Supply Chain Control
cards.description: Disrupting key logistical operations used to maintain IDC influence over global trade and resources.
bulletpoints: Tracking supply chain chokepoints controlled by IDC networks.
Exposing supply disruptions as manufactured crises.
Redirecting control of essential resources to local and decentralized systems.

cards.title: Counteracting Surveillance and Cyber Warfare
cards.description: Neutralizing IDC-controlled digital surveillance and cyber-control mechanisms.
bulletpoints: Identifying backdoor exploits in elite-controlled tech infrastructure.
Using cyber defense strategies to protect against surveillance tracking.
Building decentralized and secure communication networks.
